name: Orbital Burrow
description:
Play the WEB version (HTML5) here!

WARNING!
There's a bug that causes an invincible drill to spawn.
We apologize if it happens to you and we're doing our best to fix it.

"Orbital Burrow" is a game about fending off waves of moles from outer space!

You are a Planet and you're getting invaded by moles and spacedrills!
Use the power of the elements to change your ecosystem and extinguish the threat!

Or bash their ships with your Moon before they land!

How to Play:

  • Press Left or Right to move the Moon.
  • Double tap Left or Right to make the Moon dash.
  • You can dash into incoming spacedrills!
  • Use W, A, S, D to destroy the drills with the power of the Elements.
  • Protect the core of the Planet or it's Game Over!
